backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, admin role management, and CRUD operations for property records with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a deployment-retry task and its associated files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries of numerous frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Guide describing how to retry deployment of the current application revision using clean build steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, favicon, and mounting the React app in the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for Home, Properties, Inquiries, and Admin pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin panel for granting and revoking admin rights via principal IDs with mutation status feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapAd: Guides non-admin users on how to gain admin access and displays their principal ID with copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/HomepageAut: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication and resets query state on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/MyPrincipal: Shows the user’s principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button for sharing with admins.
frontend/src/components/BusinessInfoBloc: UI block displaying business name, address, and phone with icons using siteData.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Landing page hero section with marketing text, property image, contact options, and an auth button.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Inquir: Frontend-only inquiry form with validation, fake submission delay, and success/error messaging.
Displays a list of inquiries with name, contact details, interest, and message content.
frontend/src/components/layout/ContactBa: Renders contact and social media buttons with compact and default display variants.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing business info, contact details, hours, and a small attribution note.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main site header with navigation, branding, compact contact bar, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/properties/Inlin: Provides an inline form for creating or editing properties with image and video upload support.
frontend/src/components/properties/Prope: Displays a property with images, video, and admin edit/delete controls, switching to inline editing when needed.
Modal-based property editor allowing title, description, price, and image updates.
Image carousel component with navigation and error handling for invalid images.
Renders a grid of PropertyCard components or an empty state when no properties exist.
frontend/src/data/siteData.ts: Defines the Property interface and provides static business info, social links, and seed property data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics and derives environment metadata for debugging, with fallback logic for missing or unauthorized methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides grant and revoke admin mutations with error normalization and query invalidation for admin-related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoPlayba: Loads a video blob’s direct URL for playback and manages loading, error, and cleanup state.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Handles client-side video upload to an ExternalBlob with MIME validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiries.ts: Returns an empty inquiries list as backend support is removed, with a simple react-query wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence via an AuthClient-backed provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Synchronizes React state with localStorage using a getter/setter wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/usePropertyListings.t: Fetches and mutates property listings via actor calls, normalizing errors and refreshing queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Queries whether the current identity is an admin using available actor methods with fallback and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using HSL-like custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard handling authentication, admin checks, diagnostics display, and inquiry management UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, features, and an inquiry contact section with marketing blocks.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Renders a standalone inquiry submission page with title and InquiryForm.
frontend/src/pages/PropertiesPage.tsx: Property listing page with admin‑only create/update/delete actions and inline forms using property listing hooks.
frontend/src/README-content-transfer.md: Guide on transferring business info, property data, and images from the site to Google Sites.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines simple frontend-only types for UserProfile and Inquiry data structures.
frontend/src/types/propertyVideo.ts: Provides video type detection logic for YouTube URLs, uploaded blobs, or none.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts image files to data URLs with basic type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/icError.ts: Normalizes Internet Computer errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/src/utils/videoFileToDataUrl.ts: Converts video files to data URLs without size limits for chunked uploads.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Utility functions to extract YouTube video IDs from multiple URL formats and generate embeddable URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing admin‑related requirements, issues, and feature requests, focusing on preserving and restoring admin principals across deployments.
